thread.section_title: Hotel Stanford - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Location, location, location
thread.title_full: Location, location, location - Review of Hotel Stanford, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: moonbeam247
title: Location, location, location
text:
Slap bang in the middle of Manhattan. Close to lots of major tourist attractions and shopping. Pretty good, free, breakfast. Staff were great. Some renovations going on but not a problem. Less than 2 blocks from Penn Station,, 5 min walk. Plenty of eateries close by. Great value for money.
Only downside just one lift so had a bit of a wait in the mornings.
Would recommend.
